input.sentences: when [male] and [female] decided to become `` house flippers '' | i dont think they understood how much work went into it .
this fixer upper they bought had to have a lot of work done to it .
a lot of the masonry had to be replaced by hand which cost a lot .
as you can see | [female] really does n't look too happy with all this .
but [male] is always optimist and does n't let anything get him down like that .
output.sentences: The guy understood the house is sold as is.
The house is a fixer upper needing lots of work.
We replaced a lot of the mansonry.
My wife is happy to see the work being done.
The guy is very optimistic that the work will be finished soon.
